dcterms:creator: J. Sturm
N. Engelhard

dcterms:description: A benchmark for the evaluation of RGB-D SLAM systems, providing a set of RGB frames associated with their groundtruth pose.
dcterms:title: TUM RGB-D dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: A dataset containing sequences obtained using a camera mounted on a car in a wide variety of scenes, useful for evaluating SLAM systems in larger scale and outdoor environments.
dcterms:title: KITTI raw dataset
